title: Oops!... I Did It Again (album)
summary: Oops!... I Did It Again is the second studio album by American singer Britney Spears. It was released on May 3, 2000, through Jive Records. The album is mainly a pop, dance-pop, and teen pop record, much in the vein of her debut album ...Baby One More Time (1999).[1] It also explores a funkier and more R&B sound. Contributions to the album's production came from a wide range of producers, including Max Martin, Rami Yacoub, Per Magnusson, David Kreuger, Kristian Lundin, Jake Schulze, Darkchild, and Robert John "Mutt" Lange.[2]
